text: Consider a 3-stage pipeline with Fetch (F), Decode (D), and Memory/Execute (M/X) stages. The diagram is given below. X ps X ps X ps Fetch Decode M/X (100 ps) (82.5 ps) (476 ps) The three stages take 100 ps, 82.5 ps, and 476 ps, respectively. The fastest clock frequency this pipeline is capable of is 2.0 GHz. How long (in picoseconds) must it take to latch data into intermediate pipeline registers?
